summary: A restaurateur has it all--a successful business, a beautiful house and a loving family--until a ravishing femme fatale with stiletto heels and an axe to grind walks into his life.
cast: Brooke Burns|Tim Rozon|Ashley Jones|Rebecca Amzallag|Ken Proulx|Peter J. Gray|Brittany Adams|Joe Marques|Allison Busner|John Serge|Daniel Simpson|Cinthia Burke|Hamza Haq|Kate Drummond|Caitlin Pasquet|Alain Moussi|Paula MacPherson|Sean Tucker|Jodi Larratt|Larry Day|Tom Berry|Jennilee Murray|Alexis Maitland|Robert Reynolds|Mercedes Papalia|Chelsea Ceci|Anthony Reily Boutin|Warsame Abdi|Eric Baar|Brian J. Bicknell|Donna Castonguay|Corey Charron|Catherine Mary Clark|Ahmad Faour|Paul Finnigan|Kristin Groulx|Jen Julien|Marcela Kafie|Marc Leblond|Pavel Lubanski|Sarah McArdle|Wendy Pasher|Nathan Primeau|Hasan Qureshi|Vincent Scattolon|Zhaida Uddin
title: La venganza de una hermana
